name: Scarf Hugs
description:
Made for the Thankful Jam '18! 
What if our snuggliest clothes had the abilities to pair us with like-minded people?
This SCARF DATING SIM is a work in progress. 


Concept by Daphne Mir & Tahnee Gehm
Written by Daphne Mir @daphne_mir
Art & programming by Tahnee Gehm @tahnmeep
